From the Desk of Santa Claus | Christmas Letter Invitation

Hot Deals! From the Desk of Santa Claus | Christmas Letter Invitation – Christmas Invitations From the Desk of Santa Claus ready to ship the fastest Christmas Letter Invitation quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryLetters from Santa are incomplete without a proper letterhead. Order an authentic handwritten letter from the North Pole. Both Mrs. Clause and Santa delight in the prospect of reaching out to your child to let them know whether they’re on the naughty or nice list. They’ll make the experience fun, and you’ll have a wonderful keepsake for years to come.

Add your custom wording to this design by using the "Edit this design template" boxes on the right-hand side of the item or click the blue "Customize it" button to arrange the text, change the fonts and colors and to also add additional information or images to this design. Click "Customize Further" to open full editing options. If you need any coordinating items, (thank you cards, etc.) please contact me for a custom order.

****For custom requests you need my help with, do not place this merchandise in your cart. Instead, email me your request at [email protected] A link to your merchandise will be emailed to you once the item is available. You can use that link to place your order. Please allow up to 48 hours.
Price:$2.50
